title: Ryo Hirose
data: Ryo Hirose (廣瀬崚, Hirose Ryo, born 6 November 2000)  is a Japanese cross-country skier who competes internationally. He represented his country at the 2022 Winter Olympics.[2] All results are sourced from the International Ski Federation (FIS).[3] a Distance reduced to 30 km due to weather conditions. This biographical article relating to Japanese cross-country skiing is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
